results.title: The Life Is Strange, Live Forever T Shirt, Live Laugh Love, Live Plants, Gifts For Him, Gifts For Her, Tired As A Mother, Mom Life Shirt
results.description:
Dear Customer,

Due to Corona-Virus situation:

- the shipping and producing time of some ordered items can be longer,
- some of color/size combo can be out of stock temporarily. 

If you will have any questions, please contact us!

Thank you for your understanding!
_____________________________________________________________

The Life Is Strange, Live Forever T Shirt, Live Laugh Love, Live Plants, Gifts For Him, Gifts For Her, Tired As A Mother, Mom Life Shirt

This  ♥♥♥The Life Is Strange♥♥♥ super soft 100% cotton T-shirt with a unique custom design is your PERFECT shirt for YOU. We proudly use high-quality materials and only high-quality print. Wear it with jeans or your trendy shorts. You really will LOVE it, and never want to take it off! ♥♥♥

♥---DESIGN ---♥
This UNISEX Bella & Canvas T-shirt is made with premium quality knit cotton jersey for both men and women. Superior Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, unisex sizing, shoulder taping, and short sleeves features. A modern unisex fitted shirt, this style features a crew neck and contoured side seams for a stylish trendy t-shirt. Fabrication: 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz.

♥---SIZING ---♥
Unisex shirt with variety of colors and sizes.
The sizes are looser and longer than a typical woman tees. So we recommend to order one size down for women for fitted look. (Please make sure to measure yourself well before give the order. Thank you.)

Available sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Chest / Full Body Length Chart:
-> X-SMALL: 17" Chest x 28" Length
-> SMALL: 18" Chest x 28" Length
-> MEDIUM: 20" Chest x 29" Length
-> LARGE: 22" Chest x 30" Length
-> X-LARGE: 24" Chest x 31" Length
-> 2X-LARGE: 26" Chest x 32" Length
-> 3X-LARGE: 28" Chest x 33" Length

* Disclaimer: Please note that the above sizing chart is subject to change.

♥---CARE - INSTRUCTION ---♥ 
Follow these care instructions to enjoy long-term your T-shirt and its custom design.
Machine wash cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach, only when necessary. No fabric softeners. Tumble dry low or hang-dry for longest life. Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration. Do not dry clean.


♥---HOW TO ORDER---♥
  1. Choose your RIGHT SIZE from the drop-down menu.
  2. Choose the QUANTITY of your order from the drop-down menu.
  3. Hit the button "ADD TO CART".
  4. Let us know all info for your order in the "Notes to seller" section by checkout.
  5. That's it!
  6. We will let you know about your order and shipping details.


♥---SHIPPING INFO---♥
Please make sure your address on file with Etsy is up to date. The BesteeShop will not be responsible for any outdated or incorrect shipping information provided. Your order will be fine for shipping in 6-10 business days in the US. Please allow 5-8 additional business days for delivery from the USPS/DHL when shipping within the United States. Shipping time to Canada 10-15  business days, international shipping (out of the US and Canada) takes 15-30 business days.


♥--- I M P O R T A N T - I N F O ---♥

** Every tee is made to order. It takes a few days before being able to ship. 
** Colors may vary slightly from monitor to printed product. This can be due to different monitor settings used and the nature of handcrafted products.
** Please make sure your shipping address is correct PRIOR to check out as this can not be changed afterward. BesteeShop is NOT responsible for shipping addresses that are not correct.
** No refunds or exchanges due to ordering the wrong size. Please refer to the size chart. ** 
** Made in the U.S.A.

If you have any questions please feel to free contact us through the 'Contact shop owner' button. Do not hesitate to let us know everything you need prior to ordering.

Designs by ©BesteeShop. @ BESTEESHOP 2020   ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

results.title: This house runs on love, laughter, and cuss words

A very handsome ring for a man. But just as pretty on a lady as well.

results.title: Bedroom Wall Art, Live Laugh Love, Nursery wall art, office decor, wall art, QR code motivational quotes, inspirational Valentines Gifts
results.description:
QR code square art prints - Live, Laugh, Love. Those prints would be great as wall decor for a office, bedroom, kitchen, dining room, living room, or entryway. The QR code art I create is applied with color composition and is one of a kind. Download a free QR reader in your smartphone and simply scan the pictures, and then "Live, Laugh, Love" will show up instantly.

•	Printed on fine art paper using high-quality archival pigment inks
•	Image size: 4.42"x4.42", paper size: 8"x8"
•	Frames and mats are not included. The frames shown in the picture are 8"x8" frames from Aaron Brothers. 

If you would like to have QR codes with your personalized messages or the size you like, please contact me at http://www.etsy.com/convo_new.php?to_username=topview . I would be happy to help you!

QR code is a 2D mobile barcode, similar to those vertical lines you find on store products. Not only can it embed URL, such as your website, Facebook page, blog, Twitter, and phone number, but also provide product or service specific message, such as special offer with coupon code, promotion, greeting, or whatever you want to say.

* Please note this design fits better with your message under 30 characters. 
* Watermark(s) will be removed on finished designs.

All  QR code arts, photos, Illustrations and designs © colorelish. All rights reserved.

results.title: Live love laugh sign / Family / Personalized wood sign / Custom wall décor / Rustic Wood sign
results.description:
Our wood “Family - Love Love Laugh” signs are available in different sizes, stains, font colors and hanging options (rope or razorsaw picture hangers) to achieve a personalized warm look to your space.

This simple and rustic design features painted text and is finished with weatherproof sealer and felt feet at the back to complete the look for your space.

Each sign is handmade from natural pinewood therefore natural visual imperfections and discolorations add to the rustic charm of the finished product. No two products are alike.

Sizes: 

12” x 5.5” 
18” x 5.5”
21” x 7” 

Processing time
5-7 business days
Delivery time

USA: 3-5 weeks. Due to COVID-19 and USPS backlogs, delivery may be take up to 6-8 weeks.

UK, Ireland, Scotland: - 6-8 weeks. UK ORDERS: Please check your shipping carrier for any possible extra custom and handling fees before placing order.

results.title: Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography Printable Digital Wall Art Print in SEPiA and BLaCK Wall Decor DiY Art Print INSTANT DOWNLOAD #2287
results.description:
This listing is for a digital download of “Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography Printable Digital Wall Art Print in SEPIA and BLACK Wall Decor DiY Art Print INSTANT DOWNLOAD #2287“.
  
You will receive a sharp, clear, crisp, high quality digital image in jpeg format done at 300 dpi.   Included are 3 files – a 5 x 7 inch file, an 8 x 10 inch file, and a 16 x 20 inch file.  The image could be enlarged further, but that is best done by a professional printer with the right software to resize the image so that it retains it’s high resolution.  We recommend that a professional printer be used for all items used as Wall Art as they have the archival paper, archival inks and technology to make the image look best and last for years without fading. However, good results can easily be achieved using a home printer.  Good sturdy paper or cardstock can be purchased from local arts and crafts stores for that purpose.

Our watermark appears on the listing’s photo but there will be no watermark on the purchased image. The frame shown in the listing photo is not included in the digital download image. 

Our images are digital downloads which are downloaded and printed at home or with a professional printer.  No physical frames are included and no physical image will be shipped. 

You may download your image immediately after purchasing through Etsy’s download system.  You will receive an email from Etsy with a link to the download.  Or, if you prefer, you may click the “you” icon at the top of this page.  Choose “Purchases and Reviews”.  That will take you to your purchase history.  Scroll down to the purchase you made from us and there will be a button to the right where you can click to download the image. 

COPYRIGHT: This is a digital image store for creating your own wall art. You may print this item as many times as you wish for your own personal use. They are intended for PERSONAL USE only. Please read all of our Etsy polices for specific terms of use and copyright information.  If you wish to use our images for COMMERCIAL USE,  ie. printed as a tangible item  for sale, please contact us for commercial use licensing information..  We do not allow our images to be used commercially in any digital form whatsoever, whether as downloads or on digital media.  We do not allow the use of our images in any digital compilations, collages, or collections for sale or as freebies or promotional gifts.   If you have questions, please feel free to convo us.

RETURNS/CANCELLATIONS:  Due to the digital nature of our product and the method by which it is provided (downloads through Etsy), we cannot refund or cancel orders.  However, if you have any problems downloading your images or any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

SHARE THE LOVE:
 
If you have used or printed this image and have taken photos, please feel free to share them on your feedback.  We love seeing how customers use our images.  

THANK YOU so much for visiting our shop and viewing our listing of “Live LOVE Laugh Words Quote Typography Printable Digital Wall Art Print in SEPIA and BLACK Wall Decor DiY Art Print INSTANT DOWNLOAD #2287“.  If you love our work, please favorite this image and/or our shop.  Thanks again.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Sign/Split Arrows Metal Wall Art/Set of 3 Arrows/Wall Decor/Arrow Decor/Metal Wall Words/Cursive Wall Words/Word Arrows
results.description:
We have just moved our shop to Maui! Our current processing times are 2-6 weeks to ship out to accommodate getting our shop set up in our new location. We anticipate being back to our normal 3-8 day processing times shortly. If you need your order sooner, please contact us to see if we can accommodate. We appreciate your business and support while we start this new chapter!




Set of 3 split arrows with the words "live", "laugh", "love" in cursive. These metal wall arrows are versatile and can be used in many areas of your home or office.

Each arrow is approx.: 12 1/4" wide by 5 1/2" tall.

Made out of 16 gauge steel and a cnc plasma cutter. Hand sanded, prepped and painted.

Available in color, clear coat or polished metal.

Custom sizes are also available. Please contact us for more information.

Each piece may have slight variations.

Polished metal pieces are intended to be purchased as a "project". To prevent weathering and rusting, metal needs to be maintained with a lubricant, clear coated or painted.

Most of our pieces are hung with small needles or nails using the existing void spaces as anchor points. This way the art hangs flush with the wall and doesn't take away from the design. If desired, small holes can be added upon request at checkout at no extra charge. 
  
Need your order quickly? You can add our  listing below and your order will be expedited.

https://www.etsy.com/SimplyRoyalDesign/listing/550556836

results.title: Live Laugh Love metal sign
results.description:
The motto we all strive to live by. Live, Laugh, Love. 

This cnc plasma cut sign is an 13.25” tall x 15” wide and cut from cold rolled steel. 

A perfect gift for a loved one or for yourself.

■  HANDMADE metal art.

■  Firefighter owned.

■  PROUDLY Made in the U.S.A.

■  FREE SHIPPING  on orders totaling $35 in the lower 48.  Message for international shipping or for quantity discounts.

NOTE:  The bare metal signs will rust naturally, as all steels do.  Depending on where you live, the rust may develop more quickly.  If you prefer, select a painted option.  Message for custom colors and finishes.

results.title: Two tone resin LOVE sign
results.description:
contemporary love sign made with epoxy resin and mica powder for two tone colours. Sign is freestanding and a lovely home decor piece. 

Size is approximately 8inch long by 3inch and is half an inch in depth. 

Would make a lovely home decor gift for valentines, weddings, Mother’s Day etc. or just someone you ‘love’ :)


Due to photographs, colours may appear slightly different on your monitor than in person. 

Please note: resin can have small imperfections such as air bubbles which can add to their uniqueness, however, these will be kept to a minimum where possible.


Resin is strong & durable but should be treated like ceramic, as it can smash or crack if dropped or knocked against a hard surface.

results.title: Beach themed ‘live, laugh & love’ sign with matching trinket box
results.description:
Unique beach themed 4 piece freestanding ‘live, laugh, love’ sign with trinket box to match. Handmade made with resin and mica powder. There will never be another set the same! 

Sizes:

Live sign - 7.5inch, height 3inch and 1/2 inch deep

Laugh sign - 9.5inch, height 3inch and 1/2 inch deep

Love sign - length 8inch, height 3inch and 1/2 inch deep

Trinket box - length 3.5inch by 3.5inch height

*Note! Measurements are close but not exact*

Due to photographs, colours may be slightly different in person. Please note: resin can have small imperfections but these will be kept to a minimum where possible.

Resin is strong & durable but should be treated like ceramic, as it can smash or crack if dropped or knocked against a hard surface. To clean, wipe with soapy water. 

Thanks for taking the time to look at my items :)

{SIZE AND COLOR}:

The sizing chart is based on industry standard sizing. Please note that the measurements are approximate and may slightly vary.

---------------------

It is recommended to turn the t-shirt inside out before washing and dry on low heat. As with any cotton product, it is advised to avoid high water/heat temperatures while washing/drying.

---------------------
All sales are final.
Exchanges only as per our shop policies.
Custom shirts are non-exchangeable. Custom shirts include (but are not limited to) any shirts with 'Est.' and 'Since'

results.title: Inspirational quote "Live Laugh Love" stone coaster set
results.description:

If you have any questions or would like something a little different please feel free to message me! ALL my coasters have endless possibilities!

Is it a gift? I offer a gift wrap option. Please add that to your purchase and your item will be gift wrapped with a gift tag/message.

Need it sooner? I offer rush my order option. Please add 'Rush It' to your purchase. Your item is GUARANTEED to ship in 1-2 business days.
